activity.text:
@AdityaJ2305 
Approach: Create a reusable <Accordion> component with smooth transitions during toggling,proper spacing and other UI elements. Make it responsive around all devices.
I will integrate this Accordion into the Health Profile section of the Patient Home Page, specifically wrapping the Medication Statement content.
The Accordion component will be made reusable and can later be used in other areas of the application (e.g., Lab Results, Allergies) wherever collapsible sections are needed.

End Date:2 Days
